Naming convention Standards

- All Knowledge item names (eg Ip address, host), we will stick to  "Splunk Common Information Model Add-on" standards
- All object names in "small case"  (eg: thisisavariable)
- Reports (<yourOrganisation>_<group>_rp_<Platform/Device/Service>_<Category>_<TimeInterval>_<Description>) 
		eg: abc_siem_rp_firewall_packetfiltering_15m_breaches
- Alerts (<yourOrganisation>_<group>_al_<Platform/Device/Service>_<Category>_<TimeInterval>_<Description>)
- Dashboards/Views (<yourOrganisation>_<Group>_db_<Platform/Device/Service>_<Category>_<Description>)
		eg: abc_siem_db_os_windows_memoryusage.xml
- SavedSearches (<yourOrganisation>_<Group>_ss_<Platform/Device/Service>_<Category>_<Description>)
